verses.verse: A <S%H7390>soft<s%> <S%H4617>answer<s%> <S%H7725>turneth<s%> away <S%H2534>wrath<s%>; But a <S%H6089>grievous<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> stirreth <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>.
The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> uttereth <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H3190>aright<s%>; But the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> poureth <S%H5042>out<s%> <S%H200>folly<s%>.
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> are in every <S%H4725>place<s%>, Keeping <S%H6822>watch<s%> upon the <S%H7451>evil<s%> and the <S%H2896>good<s%>.
A <S%H4832>gentle<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>; But <S%H5558>perverseness<s%> therein is a <S%H7667>breaking<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
A <S%H191>fool<s%> <S%H5006>despiseth<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4148>correction<s%>; But he that <S%H8104>regardeth<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> getteth <S%H6191>prudence<s%>.
In the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H2633>treasure<s%>; But in the <S%H8393>revenues<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5916>trouble<s%>.
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2219>disperse<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; But the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the foolish doeth not <S%H3684>so<s%>.
The <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; But the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> is his <S%H7522>delight<s%>.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; But he <S%H157>loveth<s%> him that <S%H7291>followeth<s%> after <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
There is <S%H7451>grievous<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%> for him that <S%H5800>forsaketh<s%> the <S%H734>way<s%>; And he that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.
Sheol <S%H7585><s%> and <S%H11>Abaddon<s%> are before <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: How much more then the <S%H3826>hearts<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>!
A <S%H3887>scoffer<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> not to be <S%H3198>reproved<s%>; He will not <S%H3212>go<s%> unto the <S%H2450>wise<s%>.
A <S%H8056>glad<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> maketh a <S%H3190>cheerful<s%> <S%H6440>countenance<s%>; But by <S%H6094>sorrow<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H5218>broken<s%>.

The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of him that hath <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; But the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H7462>feedeth<s%> on <S%H200>folly<s%>.
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> are <S%H7451>evil<s%>; But he that is of a <S%H2896>cheerful<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> hath a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H4960>feast<s%>.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is <S%H4592>little<s%>, with the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Than <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H214>treasure<s%> and trouble <S%H4103>therewith<s%>.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is a <S%H737>dinner<s%> of <S%H3419>herbs<s%>, where <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H75>is<s%>, Than a stalled <S%H7794>ox<s%> and hatred <S%H8135>therewith<s%>.
A <S%H2534>wrathful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> stirreth <S%H1624>up<s%> <S%H4066>contention<s%>; But he that is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H8252>appeaseth<s%> <S%H7379>strife<s%>.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> is as a <S%H4881>hedge<s%> of <S%H2312>thorns<s%>; But the <S%H734>path<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> is made a <S%H734>highway<s%>.
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> maketh a <S%H8055>glad<s%> <S%H1>father<s%>; But a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H959>despiseth<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>.

Folly <S%H200><s%> is <S%H8057>joy<s%> to him that is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>wisdom<s%>; But a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> maketh <S%H3474>straight<s%> his <S%H3212>going<s%>.
Where there is no <S%H5475>counsel<s%>, <S%H4284>purposes<s%> are <S%H6565>disappointed<s%>; But in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H3289>counsellors<s%> they are <S%H6965>established<s%>.
A <S%H376>man<s%> hath <S%H8057>joy<s%> in the <S%H4617>answer<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; And a <S%H1697>word<s%> in due <S%H6256>season<s%>, how good is <S%H2896>it<s%>!
To the <S%H7919>wise<s%> the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H734>life<s%> goeth <S%H4605>upward<s%>, That he may <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> <S%H4295>beneath<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will root <S%H5255>up<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1343>proud<s%>; But he will <S%H5324>establish<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H490>widow<s%>.
Evil <S%H7451><s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; But <S%H5278>pleasant<s%> <S%H561>words<s%> are <S%H2889>pure<s%>.
He that is <S%H1214>greedy<s%> of <S%H1215>gain<s%> <S%H5916>troubleth<s%> his own <S%H1004>house<s%>; But he that <S%H8130>hateth<s%> <S%H4979>bribes<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>.

The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1897>studieth<s%> to <S%H6030>answer<s%>; But the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5042>poureth<s%> out evil <S%H7451>things<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H7350>far<s%> from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>; But he <S%H8085>heareth<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
The <S%H3974>light<s%> of the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiceth<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%>; And <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8052>tidings<s%> <S%H1878>make<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H1878>fat<s%>.
The <S%H241>ear<s%> that <S%H8085>hearkeneth<s%> to the <S%H8433>reproof<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> Shall <S%H3885>abide<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%>.

He that <S%H6544>refuseth<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%> <S%H3988>despiseth<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>; But he that <S%H8085>hearkeneth<s%> to <S%H8433>reproof<s%> <S%H7069>getteth<s%> <S%H3820>understanding<s%>.
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; And <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%> goeth <S%H6038>humility<s%>.
